name: RGBullet Hell
description:
In RGBullet Hell, what doesn't kill you gives you ammo!

You have a red, green, and blue weapon at your disposal. When using a weapon, you can only hurt enemies that are the same color as your weapon.

 Enemy projectiles that are the same color of your current weapon give you ammo instead of hurting you.

If you get hurt too many times while using a certain weapon. you lose. If you are struggling, change the "Game Speed" slider at the bottom to slow enemies down.
